text:
tested like this by including few arguments in plot_anat as viewed in files changed

``` python
from nilearn import plotting
display = plotting.plot_anat()
display = plotting.plot_anat(threshold=0)
display = plotting.plot_anat(threshold=None)
```

worked well without error. Any suggestions or comments if it cannot be included that way or to be included in a better way.
